title: Machine Learning
subtitle: Explore algorithms that learn from data and make predictions

topics.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
topics.description: Definition, types of ML (supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement), applications.

topics.title: Supervised Learning
topics.description: Linear regression, logistic regression, k-NN, and decision trees.

topics.title: Unsupervised Learning
topics.description: K-means clustering, hierarchical clustering, dimensionality reduction.

topics.title: Model Evaluation
topics.description: Confusion matrix, accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score, ROC curve.

topics.title: Overfitting and Underfitting
topics.description: Bias-variance tradeoff, regularization techniques like L1 and L2.

topics.title: Support Vector Machines
topics.description: SVM theory, kernel trick, applications in classification.

topics.title: Neural Networks & Deep Learning
topics.description: Perceptrons, multilayer perceptrons, backpropagation, CNNs, RNNs.

topics.title: Ensemble Methods
topics.description: Bagging, boosting, random forests, gradient boosting.
